priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Mode of Subject Contact Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C171445

self.title: CDISC SDTM Mode of Subject Contact Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the means by which interaction occurs between the subject and person or entity.
name: Mode of Subject Contact
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Mode of Subject Contact Terminology

terms.definition: An interaction that takes place in the physical presence of someone else.

A type of automated system in which individuals can access information menus containing pre-recorded or dynamically generated information with voice prompts, without the need for an agent or operator.
A form of remote communication by audio technology.
A form of remote communication by audio video technology.
Receipt of shipped material was confirmed by signature.
